channel.title: Multiple colors?
channel.description: Well i finalky made 2 scripts of my own but they all only look for one color how could i make it so they look for 3 is it a fuction or just a procedure you can put in?

item.title: Multiple colors?
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

[quote=“junior, post:3, topic:37867”][scar] If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color2,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color3,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Then[/scar]

That will look for 3 colors, is that what your looking for?[/quote]

just a little more detailed

Them color color2 and color3 should be in the const and always between the
x,y and the coords e.x msx1 msy1 ect ect ect.

like this

const

color=183839; // color here

the procedure color thing

(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15)) Or (if your using another color

to use 2 or more

const

color1=354756;
color2=445334;

chopping procedure
begin
If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Or (always there if there is 2)
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color2,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15)) then (should be at your last 1)
…

thats all you need to know about tree chopping things.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple colors?
item.dc:creator: @junior junior
item.description:
@junior wrote:

[scar] If(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color2,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Or
(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,Color3,msx1,msy1,msx2,msy2,15))Then[/scar]

That will look for 3 colors, is that what your looking for?

Read full topic

just use if () or () or() then
